O‘zbekistonda “To‘lovlar va to‘lov tizimlari to‘g‘risida”gi qonun qabul qilindi

02 Nov 2019, 23:46

Prezident 1-noyabr kuni “To‘lovlar va to‘lov tizimlari to‘g‘risida”gi qonunni imzoladi, deb xabar bermoqda “Huquqiy axborot” kanali.


Foto: “Daryo”


Ushbu qonunning maqsadi to‘lovlar va to‘lov tizimlari sohasidagi munosabatlarni tartibga solishdan iborat.

Qonunga muvofiq, to‘lov tizimi to‘lovlarni to‘lov tizimining operatori, to‘lov tizimi ishtirokchilari va (yoki) to‘lov tashkilotlarining to‘lov tizimi operatori tomonidan belgilangan to‘lov tizimining tartib-taomillarini, infratuzilmasini va qoidalarini qo‘llash vositasida hamkorlik qilish yo‘li bilan amalga oshirishni ta’minlaydigan munosabatlar majmuidir.
To‘lov xizmati to‘lov xizmatlaridan foydalanuvchi va to‘lov xizmatlarini yetkazib beruvchi o‘rtasida tuzilgan shartnoma, shu jumladan ommaviy oferta tarzidagi shartnoma asosida ko‘rsatiladi.

O‘zbekiston hududida to‘lovlar quyidagilar orqali amalga oshiriladi:


naqd pul mablag‘larini o‘tkazish;
elektron pullarni o‘tkazish;
pul mablag‘larini to‘lov vositalaridan foydalangan holda o‘tkazish;
pul majburiyatini yoki pul mablag‘larini to‘lash to‘g‘risidagi farmoyishni o‘z ichiga olgan to‘lov hujjatini berish;
elektron to‘lov vositalaridan foydalanish.

Shuningdek, qonunga ko‘ra, bank kartasining emitenti bank kartasini saqlovchini bank kartasi yo‘qolganligi va (yoki) bank kartasidan ruxsatsiz foydalanilganligi to‘g‘risidagi xabarnomani tunu kun yuborish imkoniyati bilan ta’minlashi shart.

Ushbu qonun rasmiy e’lon qilingan kundan e’tiboran 3 oy o‘tgach kuchga kiradi.

Qonunni to‘liq ko‘rinishda ushbu havola orqali o‘qish mumkin.

Uzbekistan has adopted the Law on Payment and Payment Systems

02 Nov 2019, 23:46

On November 1, the president signed the Law on Payment and Payment Systems, the Legal Information Channel reports.


Photo: River


The purpose of this law is to regulate relations in the field of payments and payment systems.

Application of procedures, infrastructure and rules of payment system established by the payment system operator, payment system operator and (or) payment system operator is a set of relationships that can be implemented through collaboration.
Payment is rendered under a contract between the payer and the service provider, including a public offer.

Payments in Uzbekistan are made through:


cash transfer;
transfer of electronic money;
transfer of funds using payment instruments;
issuance of a payment document, including a money order or a payment order;
use of electronic payment instruments.

Also, by law, the issuer of a bank card must provide the cardholder with a 24-hour notification of the loss of the bank card and (or) unauthorized use of the card.

This law shall come into force three months after the date of its official publication.
